original_title: Stronghold of Resistance: Sable Island & Her Legendary Horses
overview: Through a mysteriously enmeshed narrator, this short film takes viewers to the shores of Sable Island, a small strip of land less than a mile-wide whose only full-time inhabitants are wild horses; no human attempts at colonization have ever succeeded.
title: Stronghold of Resistance: Sable Island & Her Legendary Horses
